DONATION FAQs
  • What is my donation primarily used for?
    • Your donation will be used for:
    1. Rescue Operations: Provide more rescue personnel and equipment for rescue.
    2. Post-Disaster Reconstruction: Accelerate housing and infrastructure rebuilding.
    3. Research & Development: Provide additional funding to facilitate the development of rescue strategies and prevention methods.
  • Is there a minimum or maximum amount for each donation?
    • There is no minimum or maximum donation amount per donation. We appreciate and will put every penny of your contribution to good use. However, for donations over $10,000, we recommend that you contact our advisors for verification and confirmation.
  • Can I donate anonymously?
    • Yes. If you wish to donate anonymously, you can indicate that on the donation form. Your personal information will be kept confidential.
  • Will my donation be deducted for any administrative costs?
    • We strive to maximize the impact of your donation. However, a small portion of your donation may be used to cover administrative and processing costs.
  • How do I cancel my recurring donation?
    • You can cancel your monthly donation subscription at any time by sending an email to our official email or calling our advisors for assistance.
  • Is it safe for me to donate to Climat Foundation online?
    • Yes. We implement Transport Layer Security (TLS) to encrypt all sensitive user data to keep data sent over the network secure.
  • Is my donation tax-deductible?
    • Donations to Climat Foundation are tax-deductible only in countries that recognize Climat Foundation as an NGO.
  • What information do I need to provide to make a tax-deductible donation?
    • Information required for tax-deductible donations includes the donor's full name on passport, passport number, and full mailing address for current residence.
  • Will I receive a donation receipt?
    • Yes. We will send the donation receipt to your email, according to the contact information you provided. The receipt will contain all details for tax purposes.
